General.Name: Indo Komoditi Korpora Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Indo Komoditi Korpora Tbk produces and trades in rubber. It offers crumb rubber and dry jelutong that are used in tires, tube hoses for machines, insulators, waterproofing, and other applications. The company sells its products to Mexico, Argentina, Brazil, Turkey, Germany, Finland, Russia, China, Australia, South Korea, Japan, and India. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
